title: AR/VR-Based Construction Site Safety Training Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical skills-focused education using digital devices (AR/VR equipment), emphasizing immediate applicability for field professionals

learning_goals: Learners identify the three major risk factors at construction sites (working at heights, heavy equipment accidents, electrical safety) with 90% accuracy in AR/VR simulation environments.
PBL teams design safety inspection checklists using AR/VR tools and evaluate their feasibility for field application.
Learners execute emergency response procedures within 20 minutes through VR-based hazard scenario training.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
